screen.name: RecordTimerQuestion
screen.applet:
from enigma import ePoint, eSize, getDesktop, gRGB, BT_ALPHABLEND from Components.Label import Label from Components.Pixmap import Pixmap from Tools.Directories import resolveFilename, SCOPE_CURRENT_SKIN from Tools.LoadPixmap import LoadPixmap from Components.Renderer.BoxLogo import setLogo
pxtlc = LoadPixmap(resolveFilename(SCOPE_CURRENT_SKIN, "Screens/small_tl.png")) pxtrc = LoadPixmap(resolveFilename(SCOPE_CURRENT_SKIN, "Screens/small_tr.png")) pxblc = LoadPixmap(resolveFilename(SCOPE_CURRENT_SKIN, "Screens/small_bl.png")) pxbrc = LoadPixmap(resolveFilename(SCOPE_CURRENT_SKIN, "Screens/small_br.png"))
textsize = self["text"].getSize() textHeight = textsize[1] textpos = self["text"].instance.position() if textpos.x() < 0 and textpos.y() < 0: textHeight = 0 count = len(self.list) count, scrollbar = (10, self["list"].instance.getScrollbarWidth() + 5) if count > 10 else (count, 0) offset = self["list"].l.getItemSize().height() * count wsizex = max(self["list"].instance.getMaxItemTextWidth(), textsize[0]) + 10 + 30 descriptionHeight = 0 wsizey = textHeight + offset + 16 # move and resize screen self["list"].move(2, 6) self.instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex, wsizey))) # resize list self["list"].resize(wsizex - 4, offset) # center window width, height = getDesktop(0).size().width(), getDesktop(0).size().height() wintlcpos = ePoint((width - wsizex) // 2, (height - wsizey) // 2) self.instance.move(wintlcpos) self["tlc"] = Pixmap() self["tlc"].GUIcreate(self.instance) self["tlc"].setPixmap(pxtlc) self["tlc"].instance.resize(eSize(5,5)) self["tlc"].instance.move(ePoint(1,1)) self["trc"] = Pixmap() self["trc"].GUIcreate(self.instance) self["trc"].setPixmap(pxtrc) self["trc"].instance.resize(eSize(5,5)) self["trc"].instance.move(ePoint(wsizex-6,1)) self["blc"] = Pixmap() self["blc"].GUIcreate(self.instance) self["blc"].setPixmap(pxblc) self["blc"].instance.resize(eSize(5,5)) self["blc"].instance.move(ePoint(1,wsizey-6)) self["brc"] = Pixmap() self["brc"].GUIcreate(self.instance) self["brc"].setPixmap(pxbrc) self["brc"].instance.resize(eSize(5,5)) self["brc"].instance.move(ePoint(wsizex-6,wsizey-6)) self["bcGround"] = Label("") self["bcGround"].GUIcreate(self.instance) self["bcGround"].instance.setBackgroundColor(gRGB(0x02444444)) self["bcGround"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex - 2, wsizey - 2))) self["bcGround"].instance.move(ePoint(1,1)) self["bcGround"].setZPosition(-7) self["bcGroundOver"] = Label("") self["bcGroundOver"].GUIcreate(self.instance) self["bcGroundOver"].instance.setBackgroundColor(gRGB(0x02111111)) self["bcGroundOver"].instance.resize(eSize(*(wsizex-4, wsizey - 4))) self["bcGroundOver"].instance.move(ePoint(2,2)) self["bcGroundOver"].setZPosition(-7)
